sys_script_fix.description:
This Fix Script is for VMware Aria Automation Plugin.
Please uncomment the code before executing this fix script.
This script will delete all the records from day-2 action table and all day-2 actions catalog item will be updated with the below changes: 1. The name of the existing day-2 action catalog item will start with "DO_NOT_USE" 2. The existing day-2 action catalog item will not have any category. 3. The existing day-2 action catalog items will be in-activated.
sys_script_fix.name: delete Day2Action Record
